short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Youtube videos and save it in Notion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you consume video content with our Chrome extension! Effortlessly summarize YouTube videos and save the key points directly to your Notion workspace. Whether you're studying, researching, or just looking to capture insights from a video, this tool helps you stay organized and save time.

📜 Smart Summarization: Automatically generate concise summaries of YouTube videos.
📥 Save to Notion: Automatically save summaries in your Notion workspace.
🔍 Quick and Easy: Simple to use—just click the button, and let it do the work for you.
📈 Boost Productivity: Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to retain information efficiently.

Simplify your workflow and never lose important takeaways from YouTube videos again!
